'''Fischl von Luftschloss Narfidort''' is a playable [[Electro]] [[character]] in ''[[Genshin Impact]]''.

She is an investigator for [[Mondstadt]]'s [[Adventurers' Guild]], accompanied by the night raven [[Oz]].  A daring adventurer with seemingly outlandish theories that happen to turn out to be true, she claims to hail from a [[Immernachtreich|world]] beyond [[Teyvat]].
